bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I buzz around flowers. What am I?
I wiggle in the dirt and help plants grow. Birds love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I like it when it rains.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then live in a chrysalis, and finally get beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 My wings have lots of colors.

bug.question: I hop around in grassy fields and have strong legs. I can make a loud chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make a sound with my legs.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry things much heavier than myself. I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏠 I live underground in a big group.

bug.question: I have a bright red shell with black spots. I'm considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I have a long, slender body and four delicate wings. I often live near water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I like to fly near ponds.
✨ I can be many different colors.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. I have eight legs and can be scary. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have more legs than most bugs.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and branches. I catch prey with my strong forelegs. What am I?
I light up the night with my bioluminescent glow. I am neither a fly nor on fire. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 You can see me on summer nights.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day, what am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I give light and warmth to Earth.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's closest neighbor in space, and I have phases, what am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Sometimes you can't see me at all.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet, known for rust and robotic explorers, what am I?

hints.text: 🔥 Named after a Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I am a very big planet with a giant red spot, what am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am the largest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am known for my beautiful rings made of ice and rock, what am I?

hints.text: 💍 People put me on their fingers, sometimes.
🔭 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a picture in the sky, what am I?

hints.text: 📜 Ancient people used me to tell stories.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Earth is part of me, what am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.

cosmos.question: I am a shooting star, but I'm actually a rock from space burning up in Earth's atmosphere, what am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can create a streak in the sky.
☄️ I am smaller than an asteroid.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that orbits the Sun, growing a tail as I get closer, what am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen gases.
💫 I have a bright tail when near the sun

cosmos.question: I am a giant cloud of gas and dust in space where stars are born, what am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I look colorful through a telescope.
🌌 You can find me in a galaxy.
